name: SUTAUP
description: Forward and inverse T-X and F-K global slant stacks

parameter_descriptions.option: =1 for forward F-K domain computation, =2 for forward T-X domain computation, =3 for inverse F-K domain computation, =4 for inverse T-X domain computation (default=1)
parameter_descriptions.dt: Time sampling interval in seconds (from header if not specified)
parameter_descriptions.nx: Number of horizontal samples/traces (counted from data if not specified)
parameter_descriptions.npoints: Number of points for rho filter (default=71)
parameter_descriptions.pmin: Minimum slope for Tau-P transform in s/m (default=0.0)
parameter_descriptions.pmax: Maximum slope for Tau-P transform in s/m (default=1/500)
parameter_descriptions.np: Number of slopes for Tau-P transform (default=nx)
parameter_descriptions.ntau: Number of time samples in Tau-P domain (default=nt)
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
